contentrichtext.text: '''Charles Berry''' may refer to: *[[Chuck Berry]] (born 1926), musician, rock and roll music pioneer *[[Charles J. Berry]] (1923–1945), US Marine and Medal of Honor recipient, killed in action at Iwo Jima *[[Charlie Berry]] (1902–1972), baseball catcher and umpire, football player and official *[[Charlie Berry (second baseman)]] (1860–1940), baseball player, and father of the catcher and football player *[[Charles Berry (economist)]] (1930–2007), American economist and specialist in industrial organization and applied microeconomics *[[Charles Albert Berry]] (1852–1899), English nonconformist divine *[[Charles Roland Berry]] (born 1957), American composer ==See also== *[[Charles Bury (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|name=Berry, Charles}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Berry, Charles}}
